projects.title: Smart Personal Assistant
projects.description: A smart personal assistant application written in Python which can be customized according to your needs and can be used in almost every scenario. It uses the Naive Bayes Classifier to classify commands from the users.

projects.title: TicTacToe Game between computer and User
projects.description: Using MinMax Algorithm and by applying the techniques of Back-tracking, the computer will calculate the profit of every possible move and go for the best move.

projects.title: 9 category Document Classifier
projects.description: Using GoogleNet standard CNN architecture and SoftMax Layer to Classify Govt Official Documents such as Aadhar, PAN, Driving License(both front and back side) to verify customer information.
